name: Sam Matari
text: It was a pleasure to collaborate with Eugene. He is a very talented programmer with up-to-date knowledge. Eugene completed my project earlier than I had anticipated, and it worked perfectly. He and I will undoubtedly collaborate again in the future.

name: Bernard Sibanda
text: He is well organized and personable with an obvious passion for blockchain development. I learned a lot from his in-depth expertise in software development.

name: Samuel Safahi
meta: Chief Executive Officer at Candle Labs
text: He has a profound understanding of project development, so he knows exactly what employers need and what our developers are looking for, and he can efficiently match the two.

name: Lukas Stefanko
text: As an experienced and a very learned developer, he would also show me the tricks and best practices of software development.

name: Gergely Orosz
text: Eugene delivers and is a joy to work with! It's rare to find an individual with the skills to deliver on the task, but also the creativity to expand and enhance.  I look forward to seeing what we will build together in the future and strongly recommend you also work with Eugene.
